pr_title: chore: Migrate bigtable synth.py to bazel

timeline.message: chore: Migrate bigtable synth.py to bazel

timeline.bodyText: I don't think these should be changing. This should have generated at least the changes found here: #222 which we have yet to merge in.
timeline.author: kolea2
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,12 +73,12 @@ def generate_data_api(gapic):
   ]
 
   package_name = f'com.google.bigtable.v2'
-  java.fix_proto_headers(library / f'proto-google-cloud-bigtable-v2')
-  java.fix_grpc_headers(library / f'grpc-google-cloud-bigtable-v2', package_name)
+  java.fix_proto_headers(library / f'proto-google-cloud-bigtable-v2-java')

replies.bodyText: Sorry, that was silly me. I updated the synth.py, but did not update my command to call synthtool, so I just generated java-gerafeas (the repo I was migrating before java-bigtable).
replies.author: vam-google

timeline.message:
chore: Migrate bigtable synth.py to bazel

The changes in grpc stubs are caused by the gRPC upgrade from 1.10 (more than a year old) to 1.27 (same version which is used as runtime dependency).

The shell scripts chagnes are not related to bazel change.
